channel.title: Plz help!
channel.description:
problem # 1:
i recently found the coded for customs and i had a post about this before and it kind of helped me. the problem is that some of them items (bandos full helm, d pl8body) by default go into the "weapons" slot. there was also a problem with the d kiteshield and d cape but i figured those out. i put the ids in the appropriate places according to item classification in the item.java and item4.java files.
problem # 2:
the custom weapons (d claws, god scimmy, bandos scimmy, ss, supreme claws, && tri-godswords) dont work when i try to use them. what happens is when i go to attack it switched to a punch type attack and hardly do any damage which im guessing is just the punch attack itself, not the weapon. how would i get them to work?
problem # 3: the custom weapons (stated above in the parentheses) special doesn't work. how would i get them to work?

item.title: Plz help!
item.dc:creator: @attk_mast3r attk mast3r
item.description:
@attk_mast3r wrote:

problem # 1:

i recently found the coded for customs and i had a post about this before and it kind of helped me. the problem is that some of them items (bandos full helm, d pl8body) by default go into the “weapons” slot. there was also a problem with the d kiteshield and d cape but i figured those out. i put the ids in the appropriate places according to item classification in the item.java and item4.java files.

problem # 2:

the custom weapons (d claws, god scimmy, bandos scimmy, ss, supreme claws, && tri-godswords) dont work when i try to use them. what happens is when i go to attack it switched to a punch type attack and hardly do any damage which im guessing is just the punch attack itself, not the weapon. how would i get them to work?

problem # 3:
the custom weapons (stated above in the parentheses) special doesn’t work. how would i get them to work?
